member.name: T:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient
member.summary: Represents a RISI service client for interfacing with the RISI engine.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.#ctor(OpenIZ.Core.Http.IRestClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified instance.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.CreateParameterType(OpenIZ.Core.Model.RISI.ParameterType)
member.summary: Creates a new report parameter type definition.
member.param: The report parameter type definition to create.
member.returns: Returns the created report parameter type definition.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.DeleteParameterType(System.Guid)
member.param: The id of the report parameter type to delete.
member.returns: Returns the deleted report parameter type.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.DeleteReportDefinition(System.Guid)
member.param: The id of the report definition to delete.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.DeleteReportFormat(System.Guid)
member.param: The id of the report format.
member.returns: Returns the report deleted report format.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.ExecuteStoredQuery(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.returns: Returns the list of object which were executed as a prt of the stored query.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.GetAllReportParameterTypes
member.summary: Gets a list of all report parameter types.
member.returns: Returns a list of report parameter types.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.GetReportDefinition(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets a report definition by id.
member.param: The id of the report definition to retrieve.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.GetReportDefinitions
member.summary: Gets a list of report definitions based on a specific query.
member.returns: Returns a list of report definitions.

member.summary: Gets a report format by id.
member.param: The id of the report format to retrieve.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.GetReportFormats
member.returns: Returns a list of report formats.

member.summary: Gets a report parameter by id.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.GetReportParameters(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets a list of report parameters.
member.param: The id of the report for which to retrieve parameters.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Messaging.RISI.Client.RisiServiceClient.GetReportParameterValues(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets a list of auto-complete parameters which are applicable for the specified parameter.
member.param: The id of the parameter for which to retrieve detailed information.
member.returns: Returns an auto complete source definition of valid parameters values for a given parameter.

member.returns: Returns the storied queries on the datamart.

member.param: Whether the current invocation is disposing.

member.param: The output format of the report.
The list of parameters of the report.
member.returns: Returns the report in raw format.
